original: Ewards, Elisabeth Anna Maria, läroverksadjunkt, Karlskrona, f. 18/3/88 i Karlskrona. •— Stud:ex. v. Åhlinska sk. i Sthlm 09, fil. mag. i Lund 13, provår 30. Lär. v. Kävlinge priv. samsk. 17-21, Nyströmska h. flicklä-rov. i Malmö 21-22, e. o. ämneslär. i Huskvarna 22-32, e. lär. där 32-36, adj. i tyska o. franska v. Karlskrona h. a. 1. sed. 36. *Ewe-Ericsson, Runo, rektor, Göteborg, f. 5/12/92 i Malmö. — Stud. v. h. a. 1. i Malmö, tekn. facksk. där o. CTH, intern. flyg:certif. 17, spec:-stud. i motor- o. flygtekn. i uti. Prakt, v. Malmö stads elverks lab., v. SJis verkstäd., v. Götaverken, v. Thulinverken, h. Burmeister & Wain i Köpenhamn m. fl. Tekn. chef f. A-B Togas au to- o. motor tekn. avd. i Malmö 21-27, spec :ilär. i förbränn :mot., för- bränn :kenii o. fiygtekn. v. Gbgs tekn. inst. ’sed. 27, bitr. rektor 38, rektor sed. 41. Skr.: fl. kompend. om förbränn :-mot., i biitekn. o. tekn. gasanalyser, fl. pat. på bl. a. autom. varuhisskonstr.
translated:
Ewards, Elisabeth Anna Maria, school assistant, Karlskrona, b. 18/3/88 in Karlskrona. - Graduated from Åhlinska School in Stockholm with a studentexamen in 1909, graduated with a degree of filosofie magister from Lund University in 1913, with a one-year supplementary education in 1930. Taught at Kävlinge private school from 1917-1921, Nyström's girls' high school in Malmö from 1921-1922, acting subject teacher in Huskvarna from 1922-1932, permanent teacher there from 1932-1936, and assistant teacher in German and French at Karlskrona high school since 1936. 

*Ewe-Ericsson, Runo, principal, Gothenburg, b. 5/12/92 in Malmö. - Studied at Malmö high school, technical vocational school there, Chalmers University of Technology, and earned international flight certification in 1917. Specialized in motor and aviation technology through international studies. Worked in practical settings such as Malmö city power plant laboratory, SJIs workshops, Götaverken, Thulinverken, Burmeister & Wain in Copenhagen, and others. Technical manager for A-B Togas motor and automotive technical department in Malmö from 1921-1927, specialized teacher in combustion engines, combustion chemistry, and aviation technology at the Gothenburg Technical Institute since 1927, vice principal in 1938, principal since 1941. Wrote several compendiums on combustion engines, biotechnology, and technical gas analysis, as well as several patents on automatic elevator design, among others.

spouse.name: Runo Ewe-Ericsson
spouse.description: Specialized in motor and aviation technology through international studies. Wrote several compendiums on combustion engines, biotechnology, and technical gas analysis, as well as several patents on automatic elevator design, among others.
